description: Variation of condition 02 Ref: 25/00003/HOU to change rear elevation fenestration to bi-fold doors and to reduce number of roof lights to three
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the beginning of approved planning permission reference 25/00003/HOU dated  7th March 2025Reason: To comply with the provisions of S.51 of the Planning & Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:0208-01A0208/02b/A0208/02/B0208/03/B0208/04/C0208/05/BLocation Plan TQRQM25001103403390  Existing Block Plan TQRQM25004114357310 Proposed Site Plan TQRQM25001103607306Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved variation of Condition 3 (reference 25/00987/CND dated 7th May 2025) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture as specified in the approved application.Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
